name: Satchmo Solo Practice
description:
Practice your Satchmo Solos with Big Band from outside of Skullgirls! 

Check out this thread to see how to actually play songs.

Controls:

LMHPUIOKJKL
  • Enter starts 7 second timer letting you know how long you have to play.
  • H brings up the help menu.

This game is made with Godot and the source code is available on Github.

This game is not affiliated with Skullgirls.
